original_text: And as one of them opened his sack to give his ass provender in the inn, he espied his money; for, behold, it was in his sack's mouth.
korean_text: 한 사람이 여관에서 나귀에게 먹이를 주려고 자루를 풀고 본즉 그 돈이 자루 아귀에 있는지라

sentences.original_text: And as one of them opened his sack
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 한 사람이 자기 자루를 열었을 때

sentences.original_text: to give his ass provender in the inn
for, behold, it was in his sack's mouth.
sentences.korean_translation: 보십시오, 그것은 자기 자루 입구에 있었습니다.
